attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as you can see in the world today 
the is so much  crime and  there very little  the goverment  is doing to stop this.theres to many do gooders in this country  and the goverment is to soft and being controled  by  brussels.

the power has been taken away  from  mothers and farthers  as its called child abuse when a kid  gets a smack for misbehaving. so i call on the prime minister to give the rights back to the parances and to bring back capital and corporal punishment.
capital and corporal punishmen should only be used for  serius afences. 
such as 
murder
drug dealers should be charged with manslaughter and hung  as it should be classed as poisoning.
rapest. hang them 
pedos. should  be thrown in a room with full of weman to deal with him  then hung.
but  whats good for a guys is good for a girls.
equal rights  should stand  and wemon and girls should be treated the same 
as guys . 
if you do the crime do the time 
and be punished for it.
